1493280.description:
Elemancer: Unleash True Elemental Power – An Uncompromising PCVR Experience

Step into Elemancer, a deep physics-driven combat simulation built from the ground up for uncompromising PCVR. Forget simplistic controls; here, your precise physical movements command Fire, Water, Earth, Air, and Frost, shaping a world that reacts with unparalleled physical realism. This is elemental combat with genuine depth and consequence.

Embark on an epic single-player quest to free ancient elemental spirits and thwart cunning goblin hordes across breathtaking, physically interactive landscapes designed to push PCVR immersion to its limits.

REVOLUTIONARY PHYSICS-BASED ELEMENTAL COMBAT

  • Master hundreds of distinct, physically demanding gestures – punches, slashes, holds, and intricate techniques. This is not wave-to-win; true skill and dexterity are required.

  • Command Five Deep Elemental Forces (Fire, Water, Earth, Air, Frost), each with unique physical properties and complex interactions simulated with PCVR depth.

  • Unleash spectacular, physics-based chain reactions: Freeze foes solid then shatter them into fragments with Earth strikes, create blinding steam clouds by dousing flames, amplify firestorms with Wind, and much more.

  • Develop true skill mastery through thoughtful execution and physical dedication, unlocking a high skill ceiling.

  • Customize your approach with strategic elemental loadouts tailored for any encounter.

A WORLD THAT BENDS TO YOUR POWER

  • Manipulate an unrivaled physics simulation where the environment is as much a weapon as your elements.

  • Send goblins crashing through structures, toss them off cliffs, shield yourself with crumbling earthworks, or pull them into swirling vortexes. Physics are a core tactical tool.

  • Discover emergent strategies by creatively chaining elements and exploiting their realistic interactions with the world.

EPIC SINGLE-PLAYER NARRATIVE ADVENTURE

  • Immerse yourself in a compelling storyline as you unravel the mystery of the goblin invasion.

  • Face diverse, skill-testing challenges, including unique boss battles that demand mastery over your elemental powers.

  • Earn powerful new abilities by proving your worth to ancient elemental spirits.

Elemancer delivers the deep, physical, reactive elemental combat experience PCVR players crave. Master the elements, reshape the world with your own hands.

Wishlist Elemancer today and prepare for a true test of skill!
